office.title: Microsoft Word
office.desc: Who doesn't love Microsoft Word? I- um- well- I can use it well. Just like everyone else

office.title: Microsoft Excel
office.desc: It's satisfying when I use pyth- I mean, Excel to finish analyzing large datasets

office.title: Microsoft PowerPoint
office.desc: I might make everything on Google Slides and export it as a .pttx. I do know that making presentations are very fun

office.title: Notion
office.desc: My number one friend in being organized. Heard that many workplaces use this too!

coding.title: Java
coding.desc: I created games using Greenfoot API during high school. I vagree vhat vits very verbose

coding.title: Python
coding.desc: Self-taught to use for data analysis. I also love using this to "scrape" websites using pyperclip

coding.title: C++
coding.desc: My mom first told me that pointing is really rude. Now I get to do it practically

coding.title: JavaScript
coding.desc: ReactJS, NodeJS; Self-taught to create personal projects. I don't know what I'd do if the debugger never existed, yet I still love console.log'ing with no fear of wrist pain

coding.title: CSS
coding.desc: I can agree that I should remove this skill based of how I styled this website

coding.title: VSCode
coding.desc: I normally assume that anyone who uses an IDE other than VSCode is x10000000 smarter than me

devTools.title: Git
devTools.desc: Linus Torvalds, you are a legend.

devTools.title: AutoHotkey
devTools.desc: This is my go-to to deal with repetitive mouse/keyboard use. I can easily automate any workflow using this

digitalArts.title: Adobe Photoshop
digitalArts.desc: I somehow passed the LinkedIn skills assessment first try. Too bad I can't say the same for the coding assessments

digitalArts.title: Figma
digitalArts.desc: I only know how to use this because I know how to use Photoshop

digitalArts.title: Blender 3D
digitalArts.desc: I got lots of exposure to animation keyframing and posing using Minecraft rigs found on the internet. I learned the essentials (aka bare minimum) of 2D/3D animation through this software

digitalArts.title: Vegas Pro 15
digitalArts.desc: This basically implies I also know how to use Adobe Premiere

languages.title: French
languages.desc: Learned through the Ontario public school education system, aka I'll stuck in a conversation on the 2nd sentence

languages.title: Simplified Chinese
languages.desc: Native speaker. That just means I'll get stuck on the 5th sentence instead of the 2nd
